tasks.label: Build Debug Client
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/client && mkdir -p build-macos-debug && cd build-macos-debug && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=arm64 && cmake --build . && cp ${workspaceFolder}/client/build-macos-debug/Release/libpassgfw_client.a ${workspaceFolder}/client/build-macos/lib/ 2>/dev/null || true
tasks.detail: Build PassGFW client in debug mode

tasks.label: Build and Compile Test
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/client/scripts && ./build_macos.sh && cd ${workspaceFolder}/client/build-macos && clang -g -O0 ${workspaceFolder}/client/examples/example_macos.c -o test_debug -I./include -L./lib -lpassgfw_client -framework Foundation -framework Security -lc++
tasks.detail: Build client and compile debug test program

tasks.detail: Compile macOS example with debug symbols
